Lunarpine's transport pod sped toward the Ark ready for anything. He 
knew that Veratis controled him as long as Shadow Wing was in his 
grasp, what was wrong with him, he knew that the shoot first method 
was still the best course of action but he couldn't. One problem was 
that Veratis had neglected to give him any guns. Oh well as long as 
Shadow Wing would live he could sleep at night.
